postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
If you: 
 
- are passionate about doing social good in a big way 
 
- are a UI/UX guru 
 
- like to enjoy the benefit of working from anywhere, at your pace while still holding onto your personal time and space for work for income 
 
- either like to get back into the startup scene again or curious to get involved in a startup without losing too much in terms of giving up work and loss of income 
 
- preferably was involved in a startup in some ways 
 
get in touch! 
 
We are a small team with big dreams of disrupting the mental health space in a big way. It is our way of starting a simple project to align our working methods, see if we can pull off something within a reasonable timeline, without the stress of VC or angel funds, so we can grow organically. It will be fun and there is an idea pipeline so if the working styles complement, there is a possibility of taking on other projects on different scales. The existing team comprises of folks who have been involved in startups before.  
 
There is no requirement to go full time (yet) but passion is the #1 criteria.  
 
#teambeforeproduct
title: Seeking passionate Designer

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
We are looking for Media/Art Interns to join our team! If you love working in a fast-paced rewarding environment, then we want to talk to you! 
Interested candidates, kindly send your updated resume to mgt()createtalentsandmodels.com 
Job Description & Requirement:  
•	Orientation and familiarisation of the products and services of the company. 
•	Events management -- assist in the quotation, presentation (if any) and execution of trade shows and events. 
•	General administrative work, drafting of invoices, contracts, etc. 
•	Provide Helpdesk Support 
•	Work hand-in-hand with marketing team to maintain corporate website, increase reach of website and other digital/social mediums with up-to-date information and activities 
•	Administer incoming models requests over the phone/email for appointment booking, administrative follow up and referrals. 
•	Candidate must be currently pursuing at least a Diploma or Bachelor's Degree in Business Studies/Administration/Management, Human Resource Management, and Economics, Marketing, Commerce or equivalent. 
•	Internship position(s) for duration of 4 month(s). 
Other benefits: 
•	Excellent working environment. 
•	Significant career development. 
•	Wage system including basic commensurate with experience and productivity incentives. 
•	Training provided. 
You can also view Job Application Link Online: 
http://siva-sg.jobstreet.com/_ads/sg/jobs/2016/4/default/20/5175914.htm?9163415  
Or 
Check our Facebook page for detailed job description https://www.facebook.com/CreateTalentsandModelsSingapore/

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
This is a 6 month rolling contract with a singapore based start up in the e-commerce world. 
 
About you 
You are a driven, self motivated, energetic and curious and entrepreneurial young professional. You need to be a star in generating/creating content, researching, editing videos, editing images and managing multiple priorities. Your sole game is content creation for social media and marketing coordination - you will likely have some training in graphic design or video editing. Thats it. You will be a one man/woman team supported by two cofounders who are hands on. Most likely will work out of a co-working space or remotely as needed. There will be 1-2 days a month when weekend work is required but we are super flexible with regards to time off and working arrangements. We don't care what qualifications you have or dont have...  as long as you understand the above - we will test your knowledge during interview but most of all we want to see your energy and attitude. 
 
Requirements:  
* Adobe Photoshop/Indesign/Premier skills get you to the top of the list 
* Strong layout skills with a strong foundation of design fundamentals and colour theory. 
* Excellent English language written communication skills 
* up-to-date with new media; digital and social media savvy 
* Self-motivated, target driven, and able to work independently 
* Strong team player with a focus on productivity and deadlines 
* A perfectionist with an eye for detail down to the last pixel. 
* We like designers who ask questions and strive for quick, continuous learning. 
* Good attitude and personality. 
* able to think of the box 
 
About us 
We are two co-founders running two e-commerce businesses and super excited about the prospect of bringing in someone on-board. The business is in the personal care business (skincare, hair, baby-care, etc) we are focused on promoting high quality products that are safe, ethical and eco in nature. The industry we are in is worth over 400 Billion annually and its experiencing disruption through a change in people's mindset and values.  
 
What's in it for you:  
- An opportunity 
- 1.8K per month 
- Quarterly bonus tied to KPI's 
- Experience & exposure: you get be part of a brand new start up and see how the business is built ground up. You will take part in strategy, tactics, interviews with industry practitioners & business founders, etc 
 
1/2 yearly revisions of salary tied to your performance and impact to bottom line.
title: Digital Content & Marketing Hustler

During the internship period, you will be exposed to these areas: 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
    • Your main task is to perform project co-ordination by liaising with media agencies / event companies and models / talents. 
    • Brainstorm ideas with the team in coming up with a solution for the client and model/talent 
    • Design & execution of graphic design or illustration related projects to achieve client's objectives 
    • Engage with clients, external vendors, designers and illustrators during the development of projects 
    • Coordinate and monitor project schedules 
    • Source for external vendors 
    • To perform post-sales administration activities 
 
Requirements: 
 
    Candidate must be currently pursuing at least a Diploma or Bachelor's Degree in Art/Design/Creative Multimedia, Mass Communications, Advertising/Media, Textile/Fashion Design or equivalent. 
    Applicants must be willing to work in Orchard Central. 
    3 Internship position(s) for duration of 4 month(s). 
 
Other benefits:

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
A top contemporary art gallery in London is seeking contributors from around the globe for its Art Magazine Blog!  
 
Subject matter covered by submissions should reflect individual contributors' own interests, as long as it falls somewhere in the cultural sphere. The traditional visual fine arts make for excellent material, however, visual culture, film, theatre, fashion, literature, poetry, gastronomy and even technology all fall within the remit of the blog.  
 
Exhibition reviews, artist interviews, light lessons or analyses, visual ethnographies and other, more creative forms of opinion pieces are all readily accepted. The sky is rather the limit!  
 
Although no monetary compensation can be doled out, contributors' writing will be accompanied by a byline and any other professional biographical information they wish to promote. 
 
Please feel free to respond with ideas or final drafts with some visual elements, like photographs or YouTube video links. Submissions will be reviewed for content and edited for UK spelling and grammar. Contributors will be notified immediately once their writing gets published on the site, and are encouraged to share their work for the gallery on social media. 
 
Any questions can also be directed to the CL email address linked to this advertisement.
title: Cultural Bloggers Wanted
